channel.title: Should I Do A Remake Of ‘Neon Element?’
channel.description: [Neon Element](https://soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682/neon-element-1) [spoiler]or Neon https://youtu.be/Mwsd-6-mWfs [/spoiler] is my first [spoiler]legit[/spoiler] Track I made with Auxy. It is almost a year since I released the song and I wanted to know if you guys want to see a remake to it. [poll type=regular public=true] * Remake it! * Don’t Remake it! * Remake Something Else! (Post In Comments) [/poll] If you chose the third option, my SoundCloud is [this](https://www.soundcloud.com/shane-brown-97094682) in case you need to refer to my old songs.

item.title: Should I Do A Remake Of ‘Neon Element?’
item.dc:creator: Pinewoodog
item.description:
Yo I’m always up for hearing a good VIP mix. It’s neat to see how producers improve and how their style changes over time.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I Do A Remake Of ‘Neon Element?’

Neon Element spoiler is my first spoiler Track I made with Auxy. It is almost a year since I released the song and I wanted to know if you guys want to see a remake to it.

Click to view the poll.
